profile: For over 40 years, we have helped Ontario homeowners and builders build safer, more energy-efficient and sustainable communities. With a broad range of products and services, we are your insulation experts for existing home renovation upgrades and new residential home construction—satisfaction guaranteed. Proudly serving all of Southern Ontario, we are Ontario's largest insulation company and are Energy Star and Foam Masters™ certified. Get in touch for a Free In-Home Assessment—contact us today to learn more.
products:
✓ Spray Foam (1/2 lb open cell)
✓ HFO Spray Foam (2 lb closed cell), 
✓ Cellulose (Blown and dense-pack)
✓ Fibreglass (Batts, blown and blanket wrap)
✓ Mineral Wool (Batts)
✓ Hemp (Batts)
services:
We install insulation throughout the home:
✓ Attic Insulation 
✓ Walls Insulation 
✓ Basement Insulation 
✓ Crawlspace Insulation 
✓ Garage Insulation 
✓ Floors Insulation
brands: We offer high performance, brand name insulation backed by third party warranties. Our certified installers are professionally trained to install all types of insulation.

profile:
AGM Renovations experts provide quality basement and Bathroom Renovation services throughout the GTA and the surrounding area. See our Service Area for the complete list of towns where our  renovation services are offered. We offer 100% satisfaction guarantee on our workmanship and offer competitive prices with exceptional quality.

Expect more and when you need the best; trust AGM Renovations. We guarantee that you will be completely satisfied, which means that you don't pay until you are satisfied.
Our mission is to be committed to excel in the work we do. We are committed to excel and maintain a sense of pride in our all we do!

products: AGM Renovations, Basement finishing, Basement Renovations, Basement Reno, Finishing Basements, Basement Company, Finished Basements, Basement Expert, Finished Basements Company, Bathroom Renovations
services:
AGM Renovations offers Complete basement and Bathroom renovations packages from the professional design through the professional cleaning including:

Drywall- We employ only professional drywall installers and our goal is deliver complete satisfaction to each and every client with the quality of our workmanship and our prompt, reliable service.
    
Taping- Our drywall taping techniques will bring a high quality smooth finish, with a level of excellence you will take pride in.

Painting- We include all wall priming, painting of ceilings, baseboards, casing, crown and cove moldings into our basement construction packages
    
High Grade Laminate Flooring- is standard in our basement renovations packages.

Tiling- Shower, bathroom, or kitchenette tiling will be done by professional tile installers who are employed directly by AGM. A 2 year unlimited warranty is provided to you standard when you finish your basement with AGM
   
Plumbing- Our licensed plumbers will ensure that no problem is left unsolved and you can be sure that any drain or other plumbing defects left by the original house builder will be fixed effectively.

Electrical- We are committed to providing fully licensed electrician service as part of our standard package. Should you ever require an electrical certificate when you decide to sell your property, we will be happy to provide it to you

profile:
Northern Castle Construction is a professional home renovation and contracting company that specializes in project management and residential renovations. The company was founded on the strong belief of providing high quality residential renovation service, while also building strong client relationships in the process. The Northern Castle team works hard to guide you along every step of the renovation process, maintaining open and ongoing communication, while helping to set realistic expectations and timelines with you.

Jordan Duster has brought together a group of individuals that share his passion for quality work. He has built a fantastic team of extremely skilled, licensed, and professional trades people in order to execute an efficient renovation project, while maintaining a focus on cleanliness during the entire process. We take pride in providing a highly personal touch to all of our projects, which continues to be a company quality standard.
Whether you are looking for a kitchen renovation, a full home remodel, or anything in between, Northern Castle can assist you in bringing your creative vision to life.
name: Northern Castle Construction Inc.

profile:
Jeff Boudreau began Stellar Contracting in 2019. Jeff was countlessly working in the construction and renovation field and always seemed to be a leader and praised for his detail and work ethic.  He realized he had so much potential and wanted to give his dream of owning a business a go. It was a scary leap but in his heart he knew he had what it took to become a recognized company. Jeff has a passion for turning houses into homes and making his clients visions come to life.

As I grew up I was always fascinated in finding out the way things work, taking them apart and then putting them back together/ fixing them. I began my adulthood working in the construction field. I started off in concrete and then felt as if I wanted to learn more. 



I found that in my spare time I was meeting new people in the construction industry, asking questions and actually going out and learning new stuff. I became fascinated in the renovation field when I saw peoples dreams come true in their projects. I connected myself with some very important people who saw my potential and believed in me. I was noticing that for all the jobs I had worked at, I was basically the one in charge of making the decisions and running the project. 


My bosses always had trust in me to make the decisions when they weren’t around. This is when I decided that I have so much responsibility, I do great work and it was time for me to take leadership and pride in my own work 100%.. so why not start my own business? I want people to know my company. I want people to associate my work with being Stellar. I want to be known in the community for the type of work I do and the happy clients I have.
products: When clients come to us, they know that they can trust the Stellar team to provide them with the quality they need to make their vision come to reality. That's because we don't take short cuts, we only provide extraordinary services that come with Stellar Results.
name: Stellar Contracting

profile:
While located in Mississauga, Ontario Golden Horse Shu Living Inc. offers our renovation services all over the GTA even covering the Niagara region. We are a family run business, strongly committed to providing a high quality of craftsmanship and customer service to each and every customer, no matter the size of the job. Over eighty percent of our business is from repeat and referral customers. This success stems, in part, from the reputation GHSL Inc. has built over the past 3 years in business.
 
While other companies may send their representatives to your home, the owners of Golden Horse Shu Living Inc. personally estimates each job and works side-by-side with you on every aspect of your project from start to finish. We are a start to finish company we will get your work done in a timely manner and minimize any down time that may occur during your project.
 
Golden Horse Shu Living Inc. licensed and for your protection we carry both liability and WSIB for all of our workers and employees. Our Company stand behind all work performed and backs all projects with a full 1 year warranty.
 
GHSL Inc. offers comprehensive remodeling services and is dedicated to ensuring complete satisfaction on each and every job. Whether you want to remodel the kitchen or redo the bathroom, our team of professional craftsmen can transform your wish list into the reality of a beautifully remodeled home.
